Explained and coded in william codebook link given above
buyAndSellStockKtimesOpt(int[], int) - Static method in class leetcode.dp.BuyAndSellStock188
see the optimization formula here but for more clearer to understand given here https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/maximum-profit-by-buying-and-selling-a-share-at-most-k-times/ In the first dp problem, we have the formula for dp[t][i]=max(dp[t-1][i-1], max(prices[i]-prices[j]+p[t-1][j]) so, the second part we need to calculate for all j 0~i-1 and it requires to calculate everytime even if i just increases by 1.
